Scripts.OnLoad: self:Show() self.editBox = ChatFrame1EditBox -- Ensure no errors when using IM chat style in Blizz settings if FCF_SetFullScreenFrame then hooksecurefunc("FCF_SetFullScreenFrame", function(parent) self:SetParent(parent) end) hooksecurefunc("FCF_ClearFullScreenFrame", function() self:SetParent(UIParent) end) end
